Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to preferences under the affordable home ownership development program for veterans with service-related disabilities
Summary: Relates to preferences under the affordable home ownership development program for veterans with service-related disabilities; defines "veteran with a service-related disability".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to preferences under the affordable home ownership development program for veterans with service-related disabilities
